name.ja: <ruby>岩<rt>がん</rt></ruby><ruby>石<rt>せき</rt></ruby><ruby>魔神<rt>マシン</rt></ruby>ガレキング

requirement.en: If you have 2 face-up Rock Type Normal Monsters on your field, send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard.

effect.en: This card gains 1400 ATK until the end of this turn. Then, if you have 3 Level 5-7 face-up monsters with different Levels on your field, you can destroy all face-up Level 7 or lower monsters on your opponent's field.
